item.title: First blog post
item.description: All good blog templates should have a nice example blog post in them. This helps understanding how the system works and what to expect. Further it helps testing the site layout and generation features.

item.title: Test blogpost contents
item.description: A sample of the different site features has been collected here for quick test and review. Feel free to take a looksie and get inspired!
